titles.title: Export-Import Bank Termination Act
A bill to abolish the Export-Import Bank of the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Export-Import Bank of the United States

bill.summary: 6/6/2013--Introduced. Export-Import Bank Termination Act - Abolishes the Export-Import Bank of the United States three years after enactment of this Act.
